solution.text:
\( _{j}_ - _{k}_ = _{k}_ - a \)
We know that subtraction is NOT commutative for integers, p - q is not equal to q - p.
We take a to the LHS, and shift (_{j}_ - _{k}_) to the RHS.
\( \Rightarrow a = _{k}_ - (_{j}_ - _{k}_)\)
\( \Rightarrow a = _{k}_ - _{j}_ + _{k}_\)
\( \Rightarrow a = _{{(2*k)-j}}_\)
